references.reason: This paper is a foundational survey of reinforcement learning, providing a comprehensive overview of the field's key concepts and algorithms.

references.paper_title: Neuronlike adaptive elements that can solve difficult learning control problems
references.reason: This paper introduced the temporal-difference learning algorithm, a fundamental building block of modern reinforcement learning methods.
This paper introduced Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) networks, a crucial advancement for handling long sequences and temporal dependencies in deep learning.

references.paper_title: The arcade learning environment: An evaluation platform for general agents
references.reason: This paper introduced the Arcade Learning Environment (ALE), a widely used benchmark for evaluating reinforcement learning agents.
This paper introduced Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO), a highly effective and widely used reinforcement learning algorithm that addresses stability issues in policy gradient methods.
